## Housekeeping

::: {style="font-size: 80%;"}
-  General Guidelines
    -  Terms and conditions - check the website at rinpharma.com/post/faq/.
    -  R/Pharma is a non-commercial conference.  Vendors are welcome to attend but as practitioners, not salespeople.
    -  Please be patient with us - virtual is different.
-  Asking for help (listed on the reception page)
    - Slack: reach out in the **#help-me** channel in rinpharmaconf (**rinpharmaconf.slack.com**)
    -  Contact form on **rinpharma.com**
    -  Reach out in the **conference chat**
    -  Email to **info@rinpharma.com**
:::

## What is R/Pharma?

-  Volunteer organization of passionate R pactitioners in the Pharmaceutical and Biotech industries.
-  Annual meeting
    -  Workshops, keynotes, talks and panels.
    -  Started in 2018 (In person 2018, 2019.  Virtual from 2020).
-  Want to help?  Join our community.
    -  **email info@rinpharma.com to contribute**.

## R/Pharma at posit::conf

-  R/Pharma held roundtable summit at posit::conf 2023.
-  80 representatives for 45 companies contributed.
-  We'll be sharing the output from the discussions with the community shortly.

## Brian Bole Award of Excellence

::: {style="font-size: 80%;"}

-  Brian Bole was an innovator and thought leader in the healthcare and life sciences space, working with R and an early adopter of shiny.
-  The Brian Bole Award of Excellence is presented annually in recognition of outstanding achievements in open source life sciences.
-  This year we're proud to present it to Anders Bilgrau, Ari Knoph, Steffen Larsen and the team at Novo Nordisk for their work on an R-Based Submission to the FDA.

:::

## R/Pharma 2023

-  Visit the **EXPO** to find out information on useful resources offered by the community.
-  R/Pharma **discussion panels**.  Three panels - one at the end of each day.  Today's panel will be Novo Nordisk taking questions on their R-based FDA submission (see slido tab on the right to enter/upvote questions to the panel).
-  **On-demand content**.  Hosted on R/Pharma YouTube channel.

## R/Pharma Conference Breaks

-  Our daily schedule is approximately 4 1/2 hours each day and includes three breaks.
    -  Breaks allow you to stretch and replenish but we also include some entertainment.
    -  We encourage you to try out the networking feature of hopin to meet other conference attendees.

## Ad-hoc Meetings

-  Use the **sessions** capability of hopin to create a virtual room for meetings and discussions.
-  Presenters - this is a great way to follow-up on questions after your presentation.
